options.content: [Interpreting Prometheus metrics for Linux disk I/O utilization](https://brian-candler.medium.com/interpreting-prometheus-metrics-for-linux-disk-i-o-utilization-4db53dfedcfc)

panels.description: This metric is not available in older Linux kernels
panels.title: Disk Flush Duration
Datanode Network & File I/O Error Rate

panels.description: NOTE: this does not necessarily correlate with the JVM pauses logged by the processes
panels.title: JVM Avg GC Duration

targets.expr: max(kafka_log_log_value{topic="postDB_v2", name="LogEndOffset"}) by (partition, topic) - max(offset_consumed{topic="postDB_v2"}) by (topic, partition)

panels.title: JVM % of Time Spent in GC
Get request to first response latency
